 # Add forum (posts & comments) with moderation
 Labels: enhancement,priority:medium

Description
-----------
Add a community forum where students and teachers can post, reply, and interact. Moderation tools required for admins/teachers.

Acceptance criteria
-------------------
- Create `Post` and `Comment` models stored in DB.
- Users can create, edit, and delete their posts/comments.
- Admin/Teacher can moderate (edit/delete/flag) and view reports.
- Pagination and basic search for posts.

Tasks
-----
- Implement DB models and API endpoints for posts/comments.
- Add frontend pages for listing posts and showing a thread.
- Add moderation endpoints and UI for admins/teachers.
